name: Rescue The World
description:
This is my personal project for the Game Jam "Finally Finish Something in 2022".

This is a 2D Plane Shooter kind of game. The story is about you, a mighty hero with a rustic plane! You will travel thousands of miles, over thousands of islands and seas to face the endless enemy! You will do everything in order to save the world!

Join the plane force in a surprisingly laid-back adventure, where you casually shoot down enemy planes when listening to cheerful songs!

The control is: 

WASD or Arrow Keys for maneuvering your plane.

Left-click or Space to shoot

Get healed up by running over health drops.

Get shielded for 5 seconds or 10 hits by running over shield drops.

I hope you have some relaxing time playing my first game!

I drew all the art and wrote the codes but I do not own any sound effects or music. I got them all from OpenGameArt, specifically:                                   Adventure, Platform, Menu, BGM Pack I | OpenGameArt.org
